login.title: Sign in to your account
login.subtitle: New here? Signing in creates your account automatically.
login.googleFailed: Google sign-in failed. Please try email instead.
login.emailNote: No password needed. We'll email you a one-click sign-in link.
login.linkSentTo: We sent a sign-in link to {email}. Click it to continue. The link expires in 1 hour.
login.authFailed: Sign-in failed. Please try again or use email instead.
login.githubFailed: GitHub sign-in failed. Please try email instead.
login.heroDescription: Upload PDFs, Word docs, text files, or images. Ask questions in plain English. DocChat reads your sources and answers with citations.
login.feature1Desc: Every answer comes from your sources, not the internet
login.feature2Desc: Full chat history saved across sessions
login.feature3Desc: Your files are encrypted and only accessible to you
login.poweredBy: Powered by Groq, Gemini Embeddings, and pgvector
login.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
login.signUpSuccess: Check your email to confirm your account.
login.passwordRequirements: Min 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and symbol

dashboard.emptyState: Add sources to get started, or create an empty notebook
dashboard.readyCount: {count} {count, plural, one {notebook} other {notebooks}} ready to chat
dashboard.emptyDescription: Add sources to start chatting with your notebooks
dashboard.cloneFailed: Failed to open featured notebook. Try again.

featured.gettingStartedDesc: Learn how to upload, chat, and use studio tools
featured.researchAnalysisDesc: Analyze academic papers with AI assistance
featured.studyGuideDesc: Create study materials from your textbooks
featured.dataAnalysisDesc: Extract insights from research data and statistics
featured.productSpecsDesc: Break down PRDs and feature requirements

chat.allAnswers: All answers come directly from your uploaded sources.
chat.sendHint: Enter to send. Shift+Enter for new line. Sources shown below each reply.
chat.rateLimitError: Rate limit reached. You can send up to 10 messages per minute.
chat.genericError: Couldn't complete the request. Try again in a moment.
chat.starter1: What are the key takeaways from these sources?
chat.starter2: What are the main conclusions or findings?
chat.starter3: What topics are covered across my sources?
chat.starter4: What are the most important insights?
chat.starter5: How do the sources relate to each other?
chat.starter6: What evidence or data stands out?
chat.uploadToStart: Add a source to start chatting
chat.uploadToStartDesc: Drop files in the Sources panel or click Add Source.

sources.title: Sources
sources.dropOrClick: Drop PDF or click to add
sources.addPdfToStart: Add a PDF to start chatting
sources.unsupportedType: Unsupported file type. Upload PDF, DOCX, TXT, or images.
sources.duplicateFile: This file has already been uploaded
sources.fileLimitReached: Maximum 5 files per notebook. Delete a file to upload more.
sources.uploadInProgress: Upload in progress from another panel...

studio.title: Studio
studio.description: Generate study materials and insights from your sources.
studio.flashcardsDesc: Turn key concepts into memorizable cards
studio.mindmapDesc: See how ideas connect at a glance
studio.datatableDesc: Pull out every stat, date, and figure
studio.infographicDesc: Visual breakdown with stats and highlights
studio.generatingNote: This may take 10-30 seconds for large documents.
studio.disclaimer: Generated content is AI-produced and may not be perfectly accurate. Always verify against the source document.
studio.noNotes: No notes yet. Create one to start writing.
studio.deleteNoteConfirm: This will permanently delete this note. This action cannot be undone.
studio.oneAtATime: One generation at a time. Please wait for the current one to finish.

upload.pdfOnly: PDF only, max {size} MB. Text-based PDFs only (no scanned images).
upload.processingRedirect: Processing your document. You'll be redirected automatically.
upload.largeDocNote: This may take up to 60 seconds for large documents.
upload.timeoutError: Processing timed out. The notebook may still finish. Check your dashboard.
upload.processingFailed: We couldn't process this file. It may be scanned, corrupted, or too complex. Try another file.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

settings.title: Settings
settings.privacyInfo: Your data is stored securely in Supabase. We don't share your data with third parties.
settings.exportDataDesc: Download all your notebooks, notes, and messages as JSON
settings.deleteAllNotebooksDesc: Remove all notebooks and uploaded files
settings.deleteAllNotebooksConfirm: This will permanently delete all your notebooks, files, and chat history. This cannot be undone.
settings.deleteAccountConfirm: Are you sure? This will permanently delete your account and all data.

share.title: Share notebook
share.readOnly: This is a shared notebook. Sign up for full access.
share.chatLimit: Chat limit reached. Try again later.

members.title: Members
members.userNotFound: User not found. They must sign up first.
